'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams

dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji

ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ de bzhin du phung po

dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa

rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang /

kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par

shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs

kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /

smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs

pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi nam mkha' ltar skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / rab 'byor nam mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam

mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' la gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gos ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun

'byung la chos shes pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag

pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / gang rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha

snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper

na/ nam mkha' la brag ca gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin no/ / gang rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med

pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang

brjod du med pa'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / gang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do/ /rab

'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa yin no/ / rab 'byor chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa

med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma

mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes

pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan

'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lus rgas pa dang / 'khogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de

ni mi bde ba spangs nas dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha'i bu stong phrag mang po yang de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang na

chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du

'phel bar 'gyur te/ bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs

kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa de'i bsod nams tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che chen po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa yin no/ / rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che chen po 'di ston par gyur na dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas las

yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dbul po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs sA la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze'i rigs sA la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen por skye bar

'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong

ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar sbyin par byed do/ /de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs sA la chen

po rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba

rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'od chung gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'od gsal gyi lha

rnams yod do/ /dge chung gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sprin med kyi lha rnams yod do/ /bsod nams 'phel gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /

mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /rab lta'i lha rnams yod do/ /legs mthong gi lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /

cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod na / bsam gtan bzhi rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa

yod do/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yod do/ /

nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams yod do/ /

stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams yod do/ /mngon par shes pa drug rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs

pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /dkon mchog gsum rnams yod do/ /

sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod do/ /chos dkon mchog yod do/ /dge 'dun dkon mchog yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de dag thams cad rgya cher bstan to/ /de bas na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni

lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/

kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos rnams med do/ /rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'am / kha na ma tho ba dang

bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ 'dus byas pa'am / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang med de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni chos gang gis kyang gos pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/

rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos pa med pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/ de ltar

mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / bsti

stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du

'gro'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rjes su thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa yin te/ 'di dag gis ni mthong ba'i lam bstan pa yin no/ / rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang mthong bar byed pa ma yin/ mi mthong bar byed pa ma yin/

ston par byed pa ma yin/ mi ston par byed pa ma yin/ ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ skye bar byed pa ma yin/ 'gag par byed pa ma yin/ 'chad par byed pa ma yin/ rtag par byed pa ma yin/ don gcig par byed pa ma yin/ don sna tshogs pa

ma yin/ 'ong bar byed pa ma yin/ 'gro bar byed pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin/ rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin/ 'grib par byed pa ma yin/ 'phel bar byed pa ma yin/ 'das par ma yin/ ma 'ongs par ma yin/ da ltar byung bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thams cad

shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste dang po'o/ / rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las shin tu 'da' bar byed pa'am/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa'am/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/

gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa'am/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs dang / smon

lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/

'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ster ba'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi

rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa

ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ de bzhin du yang dag par

spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma

yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/

lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni lam shes pa'i dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste/ gnyis

pa'o// //bam po bzhi bcu pa/ rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ster ba'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams

ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid de dag ni de bzhin du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do/ /mngon par

rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo / /ston to/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal bar mdzad do/ /yang dag par ston to/ /de nas lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod de ga zha phyung

nas kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / man dA ra ba rnams 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/ /kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos

kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor bar mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos

gang yang 'khor ba'am mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i

slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams lam rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /tshad med pa dang / bsam

gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams rnam par

thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med

pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu

dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o/ /chos thams

cad kyi rang bzhin yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la chos gang yang bskor ba'am mi bskor ba yang ma mchis te/ de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba yang ma mchis yongs su mi mthong ba yang ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang bskor bar

bgyi ba'am/ mi bskor bar bgyi ba'i chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/ stong pa nyid bskor bar bgyi ba'am mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa bskor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi

bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags so/ /smon pa ma mchis pa bskor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags so/ /de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu gsal bar byas pa dang / brjod pa dang / btags pa dang / rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang /

rnam par dgrol ba dang / mtshon pa dang / yang dag par rab tu gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung / gang sus kyang ma

bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so/ /gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la ni gang sus kyang sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa ma mchis so zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par

bstan pa ste gsum pa'o/ / 'di dag gis ni thams cad shes pa nyid gsungs so/ /'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas dag par gtugs pa las thams cad shes pas dbang du byas pa spyod

pa'i khyad par gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab

'byor nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mi dmigs par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa 'di ni brdzi ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhi ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmigs su med

pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol

pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol

pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zad pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med

pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi 'pho ba dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dul

ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dul ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgrar brjod pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab

'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs dang gzugs brnyan dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di

lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa can gyi

sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gos pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor

gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi

g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos

thams cad phyin ci ma log par de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

'dod chags dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor

gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems

ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha'

dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol

pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mchog tu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhal bya ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad lhag par

chags pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigs

su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma

byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa

nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol

pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid dben pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus gsum la dus gsum po dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran

pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i

pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / sems dang / dpyod pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ dad pa la sogs pa rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa

nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa'i lam la brten pa'i rnam pa yin no/ /

rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lta bas byas pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bden pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdug bsngal dang / kun

'byung dang / 'gog pa dang lam dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ser sna dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /

rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di

lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dmigs su ma mchis pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rnam par g.yeng ba dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal ba'i shes rab dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /

rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thabs ma yin pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam ma yin pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs chung ba dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa dmigs su med pa

nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa la brten pa'i rnam pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med

pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhum pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad la ye shes chags pa med pa dang thogs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta

ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

ni de bzhin nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad

rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten pa'i rnam pa yin te/ 'di dag gis ni rnam pa gsungs so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu'am/

rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba yin na / gang 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur zhing / bzung / bcangs/ klags/ kun chub

par byas nas de kho na nyid du bsgrub par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur zhing /

bzung / bcangs/ klags/ kun chub par byas nas kyang de kho na nyid du sgrub par byed par 'gyur te/ de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas dngang bar mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/

kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris / yongs su zhus/ brten cing bsnyen bkur ba'o/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas dngang bar mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/

kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba mang po las sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/ /de dag ni sangs

rgyas bye ba mang po las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa 'di thos nas

dngang bar mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni

phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ba de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa'i slad du ste/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnams la ma spyad pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di

la mos par nus pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar bya bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par

gyur to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir dad pa ma mchis/ rab tu dang ba ma mchis/ dga' ba ma mchis/ mos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sangs rgyas

rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/ nyan thos rnams la ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la

spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom par bgyi/ ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag

rnams dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams bsgom par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad

rnams bsgom par bgyi/ ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams bsgom par bgyi/ ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams bsgom par bgyi/ ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par bgyi/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug

par bgyi/ ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 'jug par bgyi/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom par bgyi/ ji ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom par bgyi/ ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom

par bgyi zhes yongs su ma dris so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de ltar zab pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par ma gyur pa 'di bas ngo mtshar ba ci yod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la mos par ma gyur/ nang stong pa nyid la mos par ma gyur/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mos par ma gyur/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams la mos par ma gyur/ tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa rnams la mos par ma gyur/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams la mos par ma gyur/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams la mos par ma gyur/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin

rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams la mos par ma gyur par spangs par gyur pa de dag las 'dir ngo

mtshar che ba ci yod/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin

la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las byung ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rab tu brjod pa'o/ /kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid las 'da' bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par

bya'o/ /de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par

byang chub par 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sems can rnams 'god par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong

ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la sems can 'god par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sems can rnams 'god par 'dod pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar na sbyor bar 'gyur ba lags/ de bzhin du ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar na brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ de bzhin du tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang /

mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ de bzhin du rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ de bzhin du

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams la brtson par bgyid

pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka khyod legs so legs so/ /gang yang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa

khyod legs so/ /kau shi ka spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ngo / /kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / de ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba po rnam pa bzhi yin no/ / kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la

mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /mig la mi gnas/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /gzugs la mi gnas pa de bzhin du sgra dang /

dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas/ de bzhin du rna ba dang /

sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /sa'i khams la mi gnas/ de bzhin du

chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /ma rig pa la mi gnas/ de bzhin du 'du byed dang / rnam par

shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams la mi gnas pa de

ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /dran pa

nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshad med pa bzhi rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams dang / mngon par shes pa lnga rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams dang / rnam par thar

pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang / so so

yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la rnal 'byor du bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmigs pa'i

phyir ro/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la rnal 'byor du bya ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la rnal 'byor du bya ba de lta bu'i khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing

'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi

rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa la mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba yin no/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la sbyor bar mi

byed de/ gang gi tshe gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed pa de'i tshe rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du

byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang /

so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams la sbyor bar mi byed pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sbyor bar mi byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi

dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /gzugs dbus su mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs pa'i phyir

ro/ /rnam par shes pa dbus su mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa

rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /

stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs

pa'i phyir ro/ /dbus su mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba med pa'i sbyor ba yin no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i

bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po/ shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang /

rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so

yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po zhes bya ba ni zab pa'i sbyor ba yin no/ / shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /

de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang /

bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa

dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o zhes bya ba ni gting dpag dka' ba'i sbyor ba yin no/ / shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

tshad ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med

pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad

med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa

dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa'i sbyor ba yin no/ / shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed

rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan

dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams

cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// //bam po bzhi bcu gcig pa/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi

chos rnams kyi bar gyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no zhes bya ba ni zab pa'i sbyor ba'i rnam grangs gzhan chung ngu yin no/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs gting dpag dka'o zhes

bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /

pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang /

mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu

de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar gyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gting dpag dka' ba'i sbyor ba'i rnam grangs gzhan 'bring po yin no/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /

mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so

yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du ma yin no zhes bya ba ni tshad

med pa'i sbyor ba'i rnam grangs gzhan chen po yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa gting dpag dka' ba tshad ma mchis pa/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i mdun du brjod par mi bgyid de / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na dngang bar 'gyur/ kun tu skrag par 'gyur/ kun tu skrag pas zin par 'gyur du mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du 'di bstan par bgyi ste/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas dngang bar mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur/ nem nur du mi 'gyur/ the tshom du mi 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang gong nas gong du mos par

'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na nyes pa cir 'gyur/ shA ri'i

bus smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na dngang bar 'gyur/ kun tu skrag par 'gyur/ kun tu skrag pas zin par 'gyur te/ phyir rgol bar 'gyur la spong bar 'gyur zhing

mos par mi 'gyur te/ kau shi ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spangs te log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'i tshogs bsags par 'gyur ba des tshegs chen po yun ring mo zhig nas bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yod do zhes bya ba ni tshegs chen pos yun ring mo zhig nas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sbyor ba yin no/ / brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas dngang bar mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ba ni yod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas dngang bar mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag

par mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam gnyis sam gsum las mi 'da' bar de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yun ring por theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ yun ring

por pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bar byas pa de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas dngang bar mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag pas zin

par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang gong nas gong du 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur zhing / ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'gyur ba yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis spobs pa lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis spobs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de spobs par gyis shig /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ theg pa chen po

la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rmi lam gyi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du bsgom par bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de yang bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa de ltar rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gnyid ma log pa na shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bgyid pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub dang de ltar nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi ba la lta smos su ci mchis zhes bya ba ni lung bstan pa thob pa'i sbyor ba yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa thos par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang sgrub par 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i

rtsa ba yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag ni

yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/

rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bdag nyid la bskyed par 'gyur te/ bskyed nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/

klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ba'am/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba lags so zhes bya ba ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di

lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas 'byung ngam/ 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa dang / sum brgya pa dang / dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa dang / dpag tshad lnga brgya pa nas byung ba zhig mchis la mchis pa'i tshe/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal

dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi 'khor gyi snga ltas ba lang rdzi'am/ sa mtshams sam/ bza' shing gi ra ba'am/ nags tshal lam/ skyed mos tshal mthong ngam/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag mthong na de 'di snyam du gyur te/ snga

ltas 'di dag snang ba las na 'di nas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ni nye'o snyam ste/ dbugs phyin par 'gyur zhing de la slan chad rkun po'i 'jigs pa'am/ gdol pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ gcan gzan khro bo'i

'jigs pa'am/ bkres pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ skom pa'i 'jigs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rang nyid la bskyed par 'gyur te/ bskyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang

bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi ste/ ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
